scripts.compile:ganache: rm src/lib/data/artifacts && env-cmd -f .env.ganache hardhat compile --network ganache
scripts.deploy:ganache: rm src/lib/data/artifacts && env-cmd -f .env.ganache hardhat run scripts/js/deploy.js --network ganache
scripts.deploy:testnet: rm src/lib/data/artifacts && env-cmd -f .env.testnet hardhat run scripts/js/deploy.js --network testnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet: rm src/lib/data/artifacts && env-cmd -f .env.mainnet hardhat run scripts/js/deploy.js --network mainnet
